Title: Ronin Portfolio: About & Services
Context: A premium personal portfolio website for a high-discipline professional, styled in a "Ronin Premium Dark" aesthetic to drive inquiries.
Description of the screen: About and Services Section. 'About' features a professional bio titled 'The Path of the Modern Ronin' with text focusing on reliability and precision. Side-by-side layout with a minimalist portrait or an abstract ink-style graphic. 'Services' section displays 3 cards: 'Strategic Consulting', 'Product Design', and 'Technical Leadership'. Each card has a subtle gold hover effect, clean typography, and a small icon inspired by Japanese minimalism. The 8px spacing system is strictly applied for a tight, professional feel.
